description:
Mutually assured destruction was on everybody’s mind during the Cold War. Now, we live in the era of Cyber War, and there are indications that the same concept is relevant again - but in a different form. Could it be possible that offensive cyberattacks are the new deterrence? Could it be that the world went Cyber MAD?

🎯 Subscribe to @cybernews  for more AI news and cybersecurity updates: https://www.youtube.com/c/CyberNews

title: Why Cyberwar Is So Weird

description: An Anonymous member explains how he was arrested and sent to jail.
title: How an Anonymous Member Was Arrested #shorts
